msbt.message: If you have time, why don't you and I play a little treasure-hunt game?
Sounds fun.
I'm a little busy.
Why, that look on your face can only mean one thingâ€”you want to do a treasure hunt with me, starting now!
I sure do!
Not really, no.
If you're up for it, how about we play a little treasure-hunt game?
Let's do it!
I'll pass.
Wonderful! Thank you! Now, I'll go bury the treasure somewhere on the island while you wait here.
Aren't you a good sport! Now, you wait here while I go bury the treasure somewhere on the island.
Won't this be fun? Now, you wait here. I'm going to go bury the treasure somewhere on the island.
Drat! Would you look at the time! It's too dark to search right now, so our treasure hunt will have to wait.
Oh dear, I see I'll ask again another time.
That's a shame Well, let's get together when you feel up to it.
Oh, I see Well, perhaps you'll be in the mood another time. I'll ask again when I have the chance.

Alright, here's how it works.<10_7 arg="120" />I've buried treasure on the island. Find it within the time limit and you win! If you don't find it, I win!<10_7 arg="180" /> Remember, it's buried in the ground, so no need to search the buildings. Shall we begin?<10_7 arg="240" />

Alright, here's how it works.<10_7 arg="120" />I've buried treasure on the island. Find it within the time limit and you win! If you don't find it, I win!<10_7 arg="180" /> Remember, it's buried in the ground, so no need to search the buildings.<10_7 arg="180" />And, darling, this is just our little game, so any other dears you're playing with can't help you.<10_7 arg="180" /> So, shall we begin, ?<10_7 arg="180" />

Alright, my dear, here's how this little game works.<10_7 arg="120" />I've buried some treasure on the island. If you find it in the time limit, you win! If you don't find it, I win!<10_7 arg="180" /> The time limit is shorter this time, so it might be a liiittle bit tricky Best of luck to you!<10_7 arg="240" />

Alrighty, here's how this little game works.<10_7 arg="120" />I've buried some treasure on the island. If you find it in the time limit, you win! If you don't find it, I win!<10_7 arg="180" /> The time limit is shorter this time, so it might be a liiittle bit tricky.<10_7 arg="180" />One more thing. This is just our little game. That means any other dears you're playing with can't help you.<10_7 arg="200" /> So, shall we begin, ?!<10_7 arg="200" />
Shall I tell you the rules?
Yes, please!
Nope, I'm good!
Well, wellwe have a pro on our hands! Alright then, here we go!<10_7 arg="120" />
I see we have a pro here! Now, there is no getting help from friends, OK? Alrighty, here we go, !<10_7 arg="120" />
Alright, then. But I warn you, I've made the time limit shorter. Now, here we go!<10_7 arg="120" />
Alrighty then. Do be careful because the time limit is shorter this time. Oh, and no getting help from friends.<10_7 arg="180" /> Well then, here we go, !<10_7 arg="120" />
Say, if you have some free time, would you care to play a treasure- hunt game with me?
Sounds great!
Maybe next time.
Oh! ! Perfect timing.Care to try something that will add some heart-pounding excitement to your otherwise-tranquil day? There's this little treasure-hunt game I'd like to play. Would you join me?
I'd love to.
Sorry, not right now.
Oh! When did it get so late? I'm so sorry. I know it was my idea, but let's do it another time, .
Fab! Thank you, ! Now I must go bury the treasure!
Oh dear, I caught you at a bad time. Well then, come around and see me when you're free, .
Oh my shooting stars, we talked for so long I lost track of the time!I'm sorry, but it's far too late, . We best do this some other time.
I just KNEW you'd love the idea!Now I'll go bury the treasure. You just wait for me in the plaza, .
Oh! I see. It's fine, not to worry. We'll try again some other time, !
I looked all over the island, but I couldn't find a single good place to bury the treasure. And here I invited you to play I'm terribly sorry. Please, let's try again some other time, .
